dtliExcerpt: This Canadian musical about Newfoundlanders who welcomed stranded airline passengers after 9/11 is deeply moving without being maudlin, and entertaining without being trivial.
bwwExcerpt: Certainly, there is a double emotion involved in this Apple release: It coincides with the 20th anniversary of 9/11, and was filmed in front of an invited audience at the Gerald Schoenfeld Theater back in May, when all the other Broadway theaters remained shuttered.
